## Trades, trades, trades

*   Bobby Marks deadline preview
    -   UTA-NOP
        *   Garrett Temple, Jaxson Hayes, 2024 top-10 protected 1st -> UTA
        *   Jordan Clarkson -> NOP
    -   UTA-MEM
        *   Danny Green, Xavier Tillman, 2024 top-14 protected 1st -> UTA
            -   Another variation involving Kennedy Chandler and where the picks turn into '24 and '25 seconds
        *   Malik Beasley -> MEM
    -   UTA-DAL
        *   Tim Hardaway Jr, 2027 top-7 protected 1st (converts to seconds in '27 and '29) -> UTA
        *   Jordan Clarkson, Rudy Gay -> DAL
    -   UTA-BKN
        *   Day'Ron Sharpe, Kessler Edwards, and 2027 1st from PHI (top-6 protected) -> UTA
        *   Jarred Vanderbilt -> BKN
    -   UTA-MIA
        *   Dewayne Dedmon, 2023 top-14 protected pick (converts to seconds in '28 and '29) -> UTA
        *   Jarred Vanderbilt -> MIA
